suicidal.translation[0].definitions[0].e: She was depressed and almost suicidal.
For many years before treatment, Clare had suicidal tendencies  (=behaviour that showed she wanted to kill herself).
suicidal.translation[0].definitions[1].e: It was suicidal trying to put out that fire.
suicidal.translation[0].definitions[2].d: likely to lead to a lot of damage or trouble
suicidal.translation[0].definitions[2].e: Her economic policies would prove suicidal for our economy.
